K05adsp70-u:2240: asaṃkleśāvyavadānena na gatisaṃbhedaḥ prajñāyate. gatyasaṃbhedatāyāṃ na (AdSPG II 90)
K05adsp70-u:2242: akarmākleśasya kuto vipāko bhaviṣyati. yena vipākena ātmā vā sattvo vā pañcagatike saṃsāre saṃdṛśyeta.
K05adsp70-u:2244: evam etac chāradvatīputra evam etad yathā vācaṃ bhāṣase. sacet pūrvaṃ sattvo 'bhaviṣyat paścān na abhaviṣyat,
K05adsp70-u:2246: bodhisattvasya api tathāgatasya api. evaṃ pūrvaṃ bhāva paścād abhāva iti. tat syād eṣa doṣaḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2247: pañcagatiko vā saṃsāro pūrvaṃ bhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvo vā,
K05adsp70-u:2248: tat syād eṣa doṣo. yasmāt tarhi śāradvatīputra utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād
K05adsp70-u:2249: vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā tathatā avitathatā yatra na ātmā
K05adsp70-u:2250: na sattvo na jīvo na pudgalo na kārako na kārāpakaḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2251: tatra kuto rūpaṃ bhaviṣyati kuto vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā kuto vijñānaṃ bhaviṣyati. asastveteṣu dharmeṣu kutaḥ pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāro bhaviṣyati. yataḥ sattvāḥ parimocayitavyāḥ syur,
K05adsp70-u:2252: yasmāt tarhi śāradvatīputra ime dharmā īdṛśāḥ svabhāvaśūnyā tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05adsp70-u:2253: paurvakānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāc chrutvā anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye 'bhipratiṣṭhate,
K05adsp70-u:2254: na hy atra kaścid dharmo yaṃ vayam upalabhemahi. yaṃ vopalabhamānāna śaknuyām adhimoktuṃ.
K05adsp70-u:2255: yatra sattvā abhiniviṣṭāḥ anyatra viparyāsena. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2256: sannahyati. yena sannāhena sannaddhena na pratyudāvartate 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
K05adsp70-u:2259: abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām arthaṃ kariṣyāmi. yena arthena sattvāṃ viparyāsaṃ parimocayiṣyāmi.
K05adsp70-u:2260: tadyathāpi nāma māyākāranirmitaḥ puruṣaḥ bahūni prāṇikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi nirmāya
K05adsp70-u:2261: prabhūtena khādanīyabhojanīyena saṃtarpayet saṃtarpya udānam udānayed bahum eva puṇyaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2262: prasūtaṃ bahum eva puṇyaṃ prasūtam iti. tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputra kaścit atra
K05adsp70-u:2267: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu
K05adsp70-u:2268: pāramitāsu caraṃś caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu.
K05adsp70-u:2269: caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu. caturṣv iddhipādeṣu pañcasv indriyeṣu
K05adsp70-u:2270: pañcasu baleṣu saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣv āryāṣṭāṃge mārge caturdaśasu śūnyatāsu triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu
K05adsp70-u:2272: daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyām
K05adsp70-u:2273: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caran bodhimārgaṃ [f. 293b] paripūrayan buddhakṣetraṃ
K05adsp70-u:2275: na ca kaṃcid sattvam upalabhate. yam upalabhya vinayed iti.
K05adsp70-u:2277: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārga yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena caratā sattvāḥ paripācayitavyā buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayitavyaṃ?
K05adsp70-u:2279: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃc
K05adsp70-u:2281: caran yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caraṃ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
K05adsp70-u:2282: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati?
K05adsp70-u:2284: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva sattvebhyo dānan dadāti. dānan dattvā evam avavadaty evam anuśāsti,
K05adsp70-u:2285: iha kulaputra mā dānaṃ grāhato gṛhītaḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2287: yena ātmabhāvena abhinirvṛttena bahūni duḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyatha. neha kulaputra parmārthena dānaṃ na dānaphalaṃ,
K05adsp70-u:2290: na prakṛtiśūnyo dharmaḥ dharmaṃ pratigṛhṇāti. agrāhyā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā. evaṃ khalu
K05adsp70-u:2291: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvebhyo dānan dadāti na ca
K05adsp70-u:2292: tatra dānam upalabhate. na dānapatiṃ na pratigrāhakaṃ,
K05adsp70-u:2294: dānapāramitā. sa imān sarvāṃs trīn dharmān anupalabhamānaḥ sattvān srotaāpattiphale
K05adsp70-u:2295: pratiṣṭhāpayati. sakṛdāgāmiphale. anāgāmiphale arhattve pratyekabodhāv anuttarasyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2296: samyaksaṃbodhau niyojayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2297: caran sattvān paripācayati. sa ātmanā ca dānan dadāti parāṃś ca dāne samādāpayati.
K05adsp70-u:2299: ye ca anye sattvā dānan dadanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. tad bodhisattvo
K05adsp70-u:2300: mahāsattvaḥ evaṃrūpaṃ mahādānan dattvā ksatriyamahāsālakulānāṃ vā sabhāgatāyai upapadyate.
K05adsp70-u:2301: brāhmaṇamahāsālakulānāṃ vā sabhāgatāyai upapadyate. gṛhapatimahāsālakulānāṃ vā sabhāgatāyai
K05adsp70-u:2302: upapadyate. koṭṭarājā vā bhavati cakravartir vā bhavati. cakravartirājyaṃ vā pratilabhate.
K05adsp70-u:2303: tatra tān sattvāṃś caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhṇāti. katamaiś caturbhiḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2304: dānena priyavacanena arthakriyayā samānārthatayā ca. sattvān dānena saṃgṛhītān anupūrveṇa śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati. samādhau prajñāyāṃ,
K05adsp70-u:2305: caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛsv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu. yāvat saptatriṃśati
K05adsp70-u:2306: bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu śūnyatāyām ānimitte apraṇihite samādhau pratiṣṭhāpayati. samyaktvaniyāmam
K05adsp70-u:2307: avakrāmati. yāvad arhattvaṃ prāpayati pratyekabodhiṃ prāpayaty anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K05adsp70-u:2308: samādāpayati. haṃta bho puruṣā svabhisaṃbodhānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2309: tatra na kaścid dharma. svabhāvena saṃvidyate. yatrasattvāḥ sattvāḥ anyatra viparyāsebhyaḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2313: evaṃ yūyam ātmanaś ca mahāntam arthaṃ kariṣyatha,
K05adsp70-u:2314: paraṃ ca mahaty arthe niyojayiṣyathaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K05adsp70-u:2315: dānapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. yathā caraṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya. na kadācid durgatiṃ
K05adsp70-u:2316: prapatati. na jātu cakravartirājyaṃ na kārayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2317: yādṛśaṃ bījaṃ tādṛśaṃ phalaṃ. tasya khalu punaś cakravartino ye yācanakā (AdSPG II 93)
K05adsp70-u:2318: ye yācanakā āgacchanti tasya cakravartirājyasyaivaṃ bhavati,
K05adsp70-u:2319: nānyasya mayā kṛte cakravarttitvaṃ parigṛhītam anyatra sattvānām arthāya. sa bravīti yasya yena arthas tad yuṣmadbhyaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu,
K05adsp70-u:2320: yuṣmākam eva tan na mama. anenāpy anarthiko 'smy adhyātmikena rūpeṇa prāg eva anyena. anyatra mayā sattvānām arthāya saṃsāra upādattaḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2321: sa karuṇāyamāno mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrya yāvan mahākaruṇayā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
K05adsp70-u:2322: tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhate. ye pariniṣpannā bhaveyuḥ. anyatra saṃjñāsamajñāsaṃketena
K05adsp70-u:2323: vyavahārati. sa ca vyavahāraḥ pratiśrutkopamaḥ avyavahāro veditavyaṃ. evaṃ khalu
K05adsp70-u:2325: yathā carato na kiṃcit sattvānām antike aparityaktaṃ bhavaty antaśaḥ ātmanaḥ māṃsāny api,
K05adsp70-u:2326: prāg eva bāhyāny upakaraṇāni. yair upakaraṇaiḥ sattvāḥ saṃsārāt parimocayitavyā.
K05adsp70-u:2329: dānapāramitā upakaraṇaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā
K05adsp70-u:2330: prajñāpāramitā upakaraṇaṃ. yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā upakaraṇaṃ. imāni tāny
K05adsp70-u:2331: upakaraṇāni yair upakaraṇair anugṛhītā sattvāḥ saṃsārāt parimucyante. punar aparaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2332: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvebhyo dānaṃ dadāti. sa
K05adsp70-u:2333: tad dānan dadann evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate. eta yūyaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣata,
K05adsp70-u:2335: annena vā pānena vā yāvad anyatarānyataraiḥ pariṣkāraiḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2336: yena yūyaṃ vaikalyena dauśīlyaṃ kurutha. tad yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ kariṣyāmy,
K05adsp70-u:2337: annena vā pānena vā yāvat saptabhir ratnaiḥ. tad yūyaṃ saṃvaraśīle sthitvā anupūrveṇa duḥkhasya antaṃ kariṣyathaḥ. tṛbhir yānaiḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2338: śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā sarvākārajñatājñānena6vā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG II 94)
K05adsp70-u:2339: sthitvā śīlapāramitāyā sattvān saṃgṛhṇāti. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K05adsp70-u:2340: dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā ye sattvā kupyanti vyāpadyante teṣāṃ sattvānām evaṃ vācaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2341: bhāṣate. kena yūyaṃ kāraṇena kulaputrā vyāpadyadhve tena yūyaṃ vaikalyena vyāpadyadhve
K05adsp70-u:2344: annena vā pānena vā yāvad anyatarānyataraiḥ pariṣkārair,
K05adsp70-u:2346: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā tān sattvān kṣāntau niyojayati. nātra kaścid bhāvo 'sti yo 'tra sāra yena yuṣmākaṃ krodha
K05adsp70-u:2348: naivātra kiṃcid vastv asti yasya yūyaṃ vastunaḥ. kṛte abhiyujyatha. kupyatha vyāpadyadhve.
K05adsp70-u:2349: abhiṣajya kupitvā vyāpadya daṇḍena vā prahāratha śastreṇa vā prahāratha. anyonyaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2350: jīvitād vyavaropayatha. tad yūyam abhūtaparikalpena kṣubhitā narakaṃ vā prapatiṣyatha.
K05adsp70-u:2352: yā api kaścid anyā durgatayaḥ. yatra yūyaṃ duḥkhās tīvrā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayiṣyatha.
K05adsp70-u:2353: haṃ bho puruṣā mā avastukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛte. tat karma parigrahīṣyatha. yena karmaṇā
K05adsp70-u:2354: parigṛhītena manuṣyapratilaṃbho na bhaviṣyati. prāg eva buddhotpādam āsādayiṣyatha.
K05adsp70-u:2355: duhrlabha khalu mārṣa buddhotpāda durlabho manuṣyapratilaṃbhaḥ. mā imaṃ kṣaṇaṃ virāgayiṣyatha.
K05adsp70-u:2356: mā vicikitsā bhaviṣyatha. tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattva (AdSPG II 95)
K05adsp70-u:2357: ātmanā ca kṣāntyā saṃpādayati. parañ ca kṣāntau niyojayati kṣāntyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
K05adsp70-u:2358: ye 'py anye kṣāntiṃ bhāvayanti. teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. tatra tān
K05adsp70-u:2359: sattvān kṣāntyā niyojya kṣāntau sthāpayitvā anupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāpayati.
K05adsp70-u:2360: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2361: sattvān saṃgṛhṇāti. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran
K05adsp70-u:2363: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva sattvān kusīdān viditvā evaṃ bravīti,
K05adsp70-u:2364: kasya yūyaṃ kṛte kausīdyam āpadhyadve. ta evaṃ brūvanti,
K05adsp70-u:2365: pratyayavaikalyena. tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃcaraṃs tān sattvān
K05adsp70-u:2366: evaṃ bravīti. haṃ bho puruṣa ahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ sarvapratyayān upasaṃhariṣyāmi. yadi vā
K05adsp70-u:2367: dānapratyayān yadi vā śīlapratyayān yadi vā kṣāntipratyayān yair vā yair ākārair
K05adsp70-u:2369: tatra te sattvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopakaraṇair vīryam ārabhante. kāyikaṃ vā caitasikaṃ vā,
K05adsp70-u:2370: tena kāyikena caitasikena vīryeṇa sarvakuśaladharmān paripūrayanti. yaiḥ kuśalair
K05adsp70-u:2371: dharmaiḥ āryān anāsravān dharmān bhāvayanti. yān bhāvayantaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā
K05adsp70-u:2372: prāpnuvanti sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiṃ prāpnuvanti.
K05adsp70-u:2373: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K05adsp70-u:2374: dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ sattvān saṃgṛhṇāti. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo
K05adsp70-u:2375: mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sattvān niyojayati?
K05adsp70-u:2376: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva sattvān vikṣiptacittān dṛṣṭvā evam avavadati. kim iti bhoḥ sattvā dhyānāni na samāpadyadhve. ta evaṃ brūvanti.
K05adsp70-u:2377: tān etāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo evaṃ braviti. ahaṃ bhoḥ sattvās tān pratyayān upasaṃhariṣye.
K05adsp70-u:2378: yaiḥ pratyayair na vitarkayiṣyatha. adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā. tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvas
K05adsp70-u:2379: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃs tān pratyayān upasaṃharati. yaiḥ pratyayair upasaṃhṛtair na vitarkayanti.
K05adsp70-u:2380: te ca sattvā vitarkaiś cchinnaiḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante. dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2381: caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante. maitrīṃ [f. 295a] samāpadyante karuṇāṃ muditām upekṣāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2382: samāpadyante. te tair dhyānair yāvad āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayanti. yaṃ (AdSPG II 96)
K05adsp70-u:2384: parinirvānti. tatrāpare bodhimārgān na parihīyante. yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
K05adsp70-u:2385: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā samādhipāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2386: sattvān saṃgṛhṇāti. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran
K05adsp70-u:2388: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān evaṃ bravīti. kim idaṃ bhoḥ sattvā yūyaṃ na prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata?
K05adsp70-u:2390: pratyayavaikalyena. tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvān
K05adsp70-u:2391: evam avavadati. mamāntikād upakaraṇāni parigṛhṇīta. mamāntikād upakaraṇāni parigṛhya
K05adsp70-u:2392: dānāni dadadhvaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayata vīryam ārabhadhvaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyadhvaṃ.
K05adsp70-u:2393: tatraimān ākārān paripūrya evaṃ mīmāṃsadhvam asti kaścid dharmo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2394: bhāṣyamānāyām upalabhyate. ātmā vā sattvo vā yāvat kārako vā kārapako vā rūpaṃ vā
K05adsp70-u:2395: vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā kāmadhātur vā rūpadhātur vā ārūpyadhātur
K05adsp70-u:2396: vā sarvapāramitā saptatṛṃśad vā bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā. sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2397: vā. anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā. pratyekabodhir vā. yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
K05adsp70-u:2398: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃcid dharmam upalabhate.
K05adsp70-u:2400: so 'nabhiniviśamāno na kasyacid dharmasya utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2401: vā samanupaśyati. so 'nupalabhamāno na vikalpayati ayaṃ nairayiko vā tairyagyoniko
K05adsp70-u:2402: vā yāmalaukiko vā ayam asurakāyiko vā devo vā manuṣyo vā ayaṃ śīlavān duḥśīlo vā
K05adsp70-u:2403: ayaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmī ayam anāgāmī ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2404: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2405: sthitvā sattvān prajñāpāramitāyā saṃgṛhṇāti. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K05adsp70-u:2406: dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2407: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā yāvat saptatṛṃśataṃ bodhipakṣyān dharmān parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp70-u:2408: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva sattvānām upakaraṇāny upanāmayati. yair upakaraṇair
K05adsp70-u:2409: parigṛhītā sattvāś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayanti. catvāri samyakprahāṇāni.
K05adsp70-u:2410: catvārarddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni. saptabodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ (AdSPG II 97)
K05adsp70-u:2411: bhāvayanti. yena mārgeṇa parigṛhītā saṃsārāṃ mucyante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
K05adsp70-u:2412: mahāsattva sattvān āryair anāsravair dharmaiḥ saṃgṛhṇāti. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo
K05adsp70-u:2413: mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān anarthān duḥkhitān aśanavasanaviprahīṇān
K05adsp70-u:2414: dṛṣṭvā evaṃ paripācayati. eta yūyaṃ kulaputrā mamāntikād annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā yānaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2417: tad yuṣmākaṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya,
K05adsp70-u:2419: asyai so 'rtho nāsmākam iti. dīrgharātram eṣo 'rtho mayā sattvānāṃ kṛte. arjita.
K05adsp70-u:2420: tad yūyam ātmīyam eva cintayitvā [f. 295b] sattvebhyo dadata. tena ca dānena śīle
K05adsp70-u:2421: niyojayati kṣāntau vīrye samādhau prajñāyāṃ niyojayati yāvat saptatṛṃśati bodhipakṣyeṣu
K05adsp70-u:2422: dharmeṣu niyojayati triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
K05adsp70-u:2423: niyojayati. mā ca tāvatā tuṣṭim āpadyadhvaṃ. uttari vā āryānāsraveṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayataḥ.
K05adsp70-u:2425: samyaksaṃbodhau. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2426: caratā sattvāḥ paripācayitavyā. yathā paripācyamānās tribhyopāyebhyaḥ parimucyante.
K05adsp70-u:2427: yāvat saṃsārāt parimucyante. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2429: yena pratyayavaikalyena dauḥśīlyam āpadyadhvaṃ. tāṃ pratyayān yuṣmākam upasaṃhariṣyāmi. annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2430: sa tān sattvāṃc chīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā tathārūpeṇa anugraheṇa anugṛhṇāti. yathārūpeṇa anugraheṇa anugṛhītā (AdSPG II 98)
K05adsp70-u:2431: sattvo daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante. tān akhaṇḍaśīlān yāvad aparāmṛṣṭaśīlān saṃvaraśīle pratiṣṭhāpya,
K05adsp70-u:2435: katamaḥ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgo yatra sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayam īdṛśaḥ sannāhaḥ sannaddhavyaḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2436: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ subhūteś cetasaiva cetaḥ paṅvitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K05adsp70-u:2438: saptatṛṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgaḥ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni
K05adsp70-u:2439: caturdaśaśūnyatā aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattayo daśatathāgatabalāni. yāvad
K05adsp70-u:2441: api tu khalu subhūte sarvadharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgaḥ. tat kiṃ manyase subhūte asti kaścid dharmo yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na śikṣitavyaṃ,
K05adsp70-u:2443: nāsti subhūte kaścid dharmo yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na śikṣitavyaṃ. aśikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śaktaḥ sarākārajñātām anuprāptuṃ.
K05adsp70-u:2444: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ sarvadharmā śūnyā. kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate?
K05adsp70-u:2445: na nu bhagavann aprapaṃcyaṃ prapaṃcayeti. iyanta iti vā ima iti vā,
K05adsp70-u:2446: ime dharmā laukikā ime lokottarā. evaṃ sāsravā vā anāsravā vā. saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā. pṛthagjanadharmā vā yāvad arhandharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā.
K05adsp70-u:2448: evam etat subhūte evam etat. sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ. yadi punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā na abhaviṣyan na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K05adsp70-u:2449: yasmāt tarhi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ śūnyās tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. api tu khalu subhūte tad evaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2450: yadi sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanānātvaṃ karoti. iyanta
K05adsp70-u:2451: iti vā ima iti vā yāvat pṛthagjanadharmā vā yāvad arhaddharmā vā. pratyekabuddhadharmā vā. (AdSPG II 99)
K05adsp70-u:2452: buddhadharmā vā. iti. tat kaccit punaḥ subhūte ete sattvā evaṃ jānaṃti sarvadharmāḥ
K05adsp70-u:2453: śūnyā iti. yadi jānīyur nai [f. 296a] va bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitvā
K05adsp70-u:2454: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt. yasmāt tarhi subhūte ete sattvā na jānanti sarvadharmāḥ
K05adsp70-u:2455: śūnyā iti. tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
K05adsp70-u:2457: (VIII 5,13) tatra subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhimārge caratā prathamata
K05adsp70-u:2458: eva evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ. na atra kaścid dharmaḥ svabhāvena upalabhyate. anyatra
K05adsp70-u:2459: abhisaṃskārāt. tatra evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvam upaparīkṣeta. upaparīkṣya na kvacid
K05adsp70-u:2460: abhiniviśate. yadi vā pāramitāsu yadi vā saptatṛṃśati bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu yadi
K05adsp70-u:2461: vā srotaāpattiphale. yadi vā sakṛdāgāmiphale yadi vā anāgāmiphale yadi vā arhattve
K05adsp70-u:2462: yadi vā pratyekabodhau yadi vā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2464: na hi śūnyatāyā śūnyatāyām abhiniviśate. śūnyataiva tāvan nopalabhate. prāg eva yaḥ
K05adsp70-u:2465: śūnyatāyām abhinivekṣyate. evaṃ hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ anabhiniviṣṭaḥ sarvadharmeṣu
K05adsp70-u:2466: viharati. yatra śikṣāyāṃ sthitvā sarvāś caryā avalokayati kveme sattvāś caraṃti asadgrāhe,
K05adsp70-u:2468: sumocyā vateme sattvā asadgrāhād iti. tatopāyakauśalena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā
K05adsp70-u:2469: evam avavadati. eta yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvā dānaṃ dadadhvaṃ. tad yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ bhaviṣyati. bhogaiḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2471: na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ śīle avavadati. eta yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvāḥ śīlaṃ rakṣata.
K05adsp70-u:2472: tena ca śīlena mā maṃsyadhve. na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ kṣāntau vīrye samādhāv
K05adsp70-u:2473: avavadati eta yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvā samādhiṃ samāpadyadhvaṃ. tena samādhinā mā maṃsyadhve,
K05adsp70-u:2474: na tatra kinicit sāram asti. evaṃ prajñāyām avavadati. eta (AdSPG II 100)
K05adsp70-u:2477: na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ srotaāpattiphale evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphale evam anāgāmiphale
K05adsp70-u:2478: evam arhattve evaṃ pratyekabodhau evaṃ buddhadharmeṣv avavadati. eta yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvāḥ
K05adsp70-u:2481: na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. sa evam eva avavadann evam anuśāsan bodhisattvamārge carati. na ca kvacit abhiniviśate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2483: tathā hy eṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yena abhiniviśyeta. śūnyatāsvabhāvatām upādāya:
K05adsp70-u:2484: tatra subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimārge caran na kvacit pratitiṣṭhati. so
K05adsp70-u:2485: 'pratiṣṭhānayogena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati. na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2486: carati na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati.
K05adsp70-u:2487: vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati na ca
K05adsp70-u:2488: tatra pratitiṣṭhati. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. sa prathamaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2489: dhyānaṃ samāpadyate na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2490: tathā hi prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyānena śūnyaṃ yo 'pi samāpadyeta so 'pi śūnyaḥ yair
K05adsp70-u:2491: apy ākāraiḥ samāpadyate. te 'py ākārā śūnyā. evaṃ dvitīyam [f. 296b] tṛtīyaṃ caturtham
K05adsp70-u:2492: evaṃ maitriṃ karuṇāṃ muditām upeksām ārūpyasamāpattīm aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvasamāpattīṃ
K05adsp70-u:2493: srotaāpattiphalaṃ pratilabhate. na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ pratilabhate.
K05adsp70-u:2494: na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. anāgāmiphalaṃ pratilabhate na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati.
K05adsp70-u:2495: arhattvaṃ pratilabhate na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. pratyekabodhiṃ pratilabhate. na
K05adsp70-u:2499: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ na pratitiṣṭhati. katamābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ?
K05adsp70-u:2500: svabhāvaś ca teṣāṃ phalānāṃ nāsti yatra pratitiṣṭhet. yena vā pratitiṣṭhet. yo vā
K05adsp70-u:2501: pratitiṣṭhet. na ca tanmātrakeṇa tuṣṭim āpadyate. na mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ na prāptavyaṃ.
K05adsp70-u:2502: na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ. yāvan na mayā arhattvaṃ na prāptavyaṃ. na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ.
K05adsp70-u:2504: na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ. yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2505: tathā hi mayā prathamacittotpādam upādāya nānyaṃ cittaṃ pratilabdham anyatra anuttarasyā samyaksaṃbodheḥ. tat kasya (AdSPG II 101)
K05adsp70-u:2506: hetoḥ? tathā hi mayā prathamam bhūmim upādāya na anyaṃ cittam utpāditam anyatra anuttarasyā
K05adsp70-u:2507: samyaksaṃbodheḥ. evaṃ yāvad daśamī bhūmir yāvad bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntaḥ na anyaḥ
K05adsp70-u:2508: kaści cittotpāda utpādito 'nyatra anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. avikṣiptamanasā,
K05adsp70-u:2509: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvad eva kāyena parākramate. vācā manasā nānyatra bodhicittena,
K05adsp70-u:2510: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhicitte sthitvā avikṣiptama. nasā bodhimārgam utpādayati.
K05adsp70-u:2511: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ sarvadharmā anutpannās tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimārgam utpādayati?
K05adsp70-u:2513: evam etat subhūte evam etat. sarvadharmā anutpannā,
K05adsp70-u:2514: tat punaḥ katham iti. ye 'nābhisaṃskurvanti teṣāṃ sarvadharmā anutpannāḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2515: āha: na nu punar bhagavann utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaiva dharmāṇān dharmasthiti?
K05adsp70-u:2517: evam etat subhūte evam etat. utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaiva dharmāṇān dharmasthitiḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2518: ye punar imāṃ dharmasthitiṃ na jānanti teṣām arthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimārgam utpādayati. yena bodhisattvamārgeṇa sattvān mocayati
K05adsp70-u:2519: (VIII 5,14) āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann utpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
K05adsp70-u:2521: āha: tad anutpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
K05adsp70-u:2523: āha: tad utpannena anutpannena ca mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
K05adsp70-u:2525: āha: tan naivotpannena naivānutpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
K05adsp70-u:2527: āha: tat kathaṃ punar bhagavaṃ. bodhiḥ prāpyate.
K05adsp70-u:2529: na subhūte mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate. na amārgeṇa. bodhir eva mārgo mārga eva bodhiḥ.
K05adsp70-u:2531: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ bodhir eva mārgo mārga eva bodhiḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2532: tat prāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhiḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2533: tat kathaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nirdiśyate. dvātṛṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇair
K05adsp70-u:2534: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir yāvad
K05adsp70-u:2537: [f. 297a] tat kiṃ manyase subhūte buddho bodhiṃ prāpnoti?
K05adsp70-u:2539: na buddho bodhiṃ prāpnoti. buddha eva bodhir bodhir eva buddhaḥ.
K05adsp70-u:2541: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha. tat prāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhir
K05adsp70-u:2542: iti. iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭpāramitāṃ paripūrya saptatṛṃśataṃ bodhipakṣyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2543: dharmān paripūrya daśatathāgatabalāni. catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido:
K05adsp70-u:2544: mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇām aṣṭādaśāveṇikāṃ buddhadharmān paripūrya vajropamena samādhinā
K05adsp70-u:2545: ekacittakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajnayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. anuttarāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2546: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ tadā tathāgata iti nirdiśyate. sarvadarśī sarvadharmavaśavartī.
K05adsp70-u:2548: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati?
K05adsp70-u:2550: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya. kāyadauṣṭulyaṃ vāgdauṣṭulyaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2551: manodauṣṭulyam ātmanaś ca parasya ca pariśodhayati. yaiḥ pariśuddhair buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati.
K05adsp70-u:2552: āha: katamad bhagavan kāyadauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
K05adsp70-u:2555: yat kāyakarmākuśalaṃ prāṇātipātaḥ ādattadānaṃ kāmamithyācāraḥ idaṃ kāyadauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. yad vākkarmākuśalaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ paiśunyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2556: idaṃ vāgdauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. yan manaskarmākuśale abhidhyā vyāpado mithyādṛṣṭi idaṃ manodauṣṭulyaṃ (AdSPG II 103)
K05adsp70-u:2557: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. punar aparaṃ subhūte yan matsaryacittam idaṃ manodauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
K05adsp70-u:2558: yad dauśīlyacittaṃ kṣobhanācittaṃ kausīdyacittaṃ vikṣepacittam asamahitacittaṃ dauṣprajñacittam
K05adsp70-u:2559: idam api manodauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. punar aparaṃ subhūte yac chīlāpariśuddhim
K05adsp70-u:2560: idam api dauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. punar aparaṃ subhūte yac caturbhir
K05adsp70-u:2561: smṛtyupasthānair virahita idam api dauṣṭulyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. evaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2562: caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhi ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir indriyaiḥ pañcabhir balai
K05adsp70-u:2563: saptabhir bodhyaṅgair āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa. śūnyatāyāḥ samādhinā ānimittena samādhinā
K05adsp70-u:2564: apraṇihitena samādhinā virahita idam api dauṣṭulyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
K05adsp70-u:2565: punar aparaṃ subhūte yat srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyā tatra ca aspṛhaṇatā idam api
K05adsp70-u:2566: dauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. evaṃ yāvad arhattve pratyekabodhau vā. spṛhaṇatā
K05adsp70-u:2567: idam api dauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. punar aparaṃ subhūte rūpasaṃjñā
K05adsp70-u:2568: dauṣṭulyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñā saṃjñāsaṃjñā saṃskārasaṃjñā vijñānasaṃjñā dauṣṭulyaṃ,
K05adsp70-u:2569: cakṣusaṃjñā srotrasaṃjñā ghrāṇasaṃjñā jihvasaṃjñā kāyasaṃjñā manaḥsaṃjñā idam api
K05adsp70-u:2570: dauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. rūpasaṃjñā yāvad dharmasaṃjñā. cakṣurdhātusaṃjñā
K05adsp70-u:2571: yāvan manodhātusaṃjñā. [f. 297b] strisaṃjñā pudgalasaṃjñā. kāmadhātusaṃjñā rūpadhātusaṃjñā
K05adsp70-u:2572: arūpadhātusaṃjñā kuśalasaṃjñā akuśalasaṃjñā yāvat saṃskṛtasaṃjñā asaṃskṛtasaṃjñā
K05adsp70-u:2574: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvāṇi tāni dauṣṭulyāni vivarjya
K05adsp70-u:2575: ātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti parāṃś ca dāne samādāpayati. so 'nnam annārthikebhyo dadāti.
K05adsp70-u:2577: yāvad anyatarānyatarāṇy upakaraṇārthikebhyo dadāti. paraṃ ca upakaraṇadāne samādāpayati.
K05adsp70-u:2578: pratiṣṭhāpayati. tataś ca yat kuśalamūlaṃ tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye
K05adsp70-u:2579: pariṇāmayati. evaṃ śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyāṃ,
K05adsp70-u:2580: yāvat sa ātmanā ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptabhir ratnaiḥ paripūrya tṛbhyo ratnebhyo dānaṃ dadāti,
K05adsp70-u:2582: anena me kuśalamūlena saptaratnamayaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ (AdSPG II 104)
K05adsp70-u:2583: bhavatu. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyāni vādyāni vādayati. buddheṣu vā buddhacaityeṣu vā. tasvyaivaṃ bhavaty,
K05adsp70-u:2584: anena kuśalamūlena tatra me buddhakṣetre divyāś śabdāḥ manojñā satatasamitaṃ vādyantāṃ.
K05adsp70-u:2585: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ divyagandhaparipūrṇaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2586: kṛtvā buddhebhyo vā buddhacaityebhyo vā dadāti. tasyaivaṃ bhavaty,
K05adsp70-u:2587: anena kuśalamūlena tatra me buddhakṣetre divyā gandhā pravāntu. punar aparaṃ subhūte
K05adsp70-u:2588: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śatarasāni bhojanāni tathāgatebhyo vā tathāgataśrāvakebhyo
K05adsp70-u:2590: anena kuśalamūlena tatra me buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya
K05adsp70-u:2591: śrāvakasaṃghasya śatarasāni bhojanāny abhinirvartaṃtāṃ. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo
K05adsp70-u:2592: mahāsattvo divyāny anulepanāni dadāti. tathāgateṣu vā tathāgatacaityeṣu vā. tasyaivaṃ bhavaty,
K05adsp70-u:2593: anena kuśalamūlena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra me buddhakṣetre
K05adsp70-u:2594: sarvasattvāni divyāḥ sparśā abhinirvartantām. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya
K05adsp70-u:2595: mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhavati. manorathasaṃkalpair eva iṣṭān pañcakāmaguṇāṃ buddhānāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2596: bhagavatāṃ śrāvakānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca upanāmayeyaṃ. tasyaivaṃ jānataḥ evaṃ bhavaty,
K05adsp70-u:2597: anena kuśalamūlena tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya
K05adsp70-u:2598: sarvaśrāvakasaṃghasya sarvasattvānāṃ ca manorathasaṃkalpenaiva iṣṭāḥ pañcakāmaguṇāḥ
K05adsp70-u:2599: prādurbhavanti. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2600: buddhebhyo vā śrāvakebhyo vā pañcakāmaguṇān dānan dadāti. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya
K05adsp70-u:2601: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati. yanv aham ātmanā ca prathamaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2602: dhyānaṃ samāpadyeya. sarvasattvāṃś ca prathame dhyāne niveśayeyaṃ. evaṃ yāva caturthe
K05adsp70-u:2603: dhyāne niveśayeyaṃ. pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ. maitryāṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyām upekṣayāṃ yāvat
K05adsp70-u:2604: saptatṛṃśati bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu. tasya me 'nuttarasamyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya
K05adsp70-u:2605: sarvasattvāś caturbhir dhyānair avirahitā bhaveyuś caturbhir apramāṇaiś caturbhir
K05adsp70-u:2606: smṛtyupasthānair yāvat saptatṛṃśati bodhipakṣyair dharmair avirahitā bhaveyu. evaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2607: khalu subhūte [f. 298a] bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati, (AdSPG II 105)
K05adsp70-u:2608: sa tāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ na abhisaṃbudhyate. yāvan neme sarva abhiprāyā paripūryante.
K05adsp70-u:2609: sa ātmanā ca sarvakuśalamūlasamanvāgato bhavati. tāṃś ca sarvasattvān kuśalamūlasamanvāgatān
K05adsp70-u:2610: karoti. tasya abhirūpaḥ kāyo bhavaty apy ātmanaḥ api teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ye tena bodhisattvena
K05adsp70-u:2611: mahāsattvena paripācitā. teṣāṃ so 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādika. kāyo 'bhinirvartate.
K05adsp70-u:2612: yaduta puṇyaparigṛhītatvāt. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ
K05adsp70-u:2613: pariśodhayati. tathā ca pariśodhayati. yathā trayāṇām apāyānāṃ prajñaptir api na
K05adsp70-u:2614: bhaviṣyati. dṛṣṭigatānām api prajñaptir na bhaviṣyati. rāgadoṣamohānāṃ prajñaptir
K05adsp70-u:2615: na bhaviṣyati. stripuruṣaprajñaptir na bhaviṣyati. dvayor yānayo prajñaptir na bhaviṣyati.
K05adsp70-u:2616: anityaduḥkha anātmaprajñaptir na bhaviṣyati. parigrāhaprajñaptir na bhaviṣyati. ahaṃkāramamakāraprajñaptir
K05adsp70-u:2617: na bhaviṣyati. anuśayaparyutthānaprajñaptir na bhaviṣyati. viparyāsaprajñaptir na
K05adsp70-u:2618: bhaviṣyati. phalavyavasthānaprajñaptir na bhaviṣyati. anyatra śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasya
K05adsp70-u:2619: samādher ghoṣo niścariṣyati. tyāgecchatāyā. sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ghoṣo niścariṣyati.
K05adsp70-u:2620: yadi vādhyātmikānāṃ yadi vā bāhyānāṃ vāritānām evaṃ ghoṣo niścariṣyati. śūnyatā iti
K05adsp70-u:2621: vā ānimittam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā. yathaivaiṣān dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvas tathaiva
K05adsp70-u:2622: śabdo niścariṣyati. sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyā iti,
K05adsp70-u:2623: yathā teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvas tathaiva śabdo niścariṣyati. utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2624: yac chūnyaṃ tatra nimittaṃ nāsti. yatra nimittaṃ nāsti tad apraṇihitaṃ. eṣā sā evaṃrūpā
K05adsp70-u:2625: dharmadeśanā niścariṣyati. rātrau vā divā vā sthitānāṃ vā niṣaṇṇānāṃ vā. śayānāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2626: vā caṃkramyamāṇānāṃ vā. īdṛśī dharmadeśanā niścariṣyati. tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2627: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya. tasya khalu punas tathāgatasya arhata samyaksaṃbuddhasya
K05adsp70-u:2628: ye daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas te sarve varṇaṃ bhāṣante. ye khalu
K05adsp70-u:2629: punas tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti. sarve te niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarasyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2630: samyaksaṃbodhau. tasya khalu punas tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ (AdSPG II 106)
K05adsp70-u:2631: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya dharman deśayato na kasyacit sattvasya saṃśayo bhaviṣyaty ayaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ na dharma iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2632: yā khalu punar sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na tatra kaścid adharmaḥ sarva sa dharmaḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2633: tatra ye sattvā akuśalamūlagrastā anavaruptakuśalamūlā buddheṣu vā buddhaśrāvakeṣu
K05adsp70-u:2634: vā. akalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā ātmadṛṣṭim ālīyante. yāvat sarvadṛṣṭigatāny ālīyante.
K05adsp70-u:2636: te mithyāgrāheṇa gṛhītā asamyaksaṃbuddheṣu samyaksaṃbuddhasaṃjñinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddheṣu
K05adsp70-u:2637: vā asamyaksaṃbuddhasaṃjñinaḥ. te adharmaṃ dharma iti vadanti. dharmaṃ vā adharma
K05adsp70-u:2639: pratikṣipya kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātān narakeṣu upapadyante,
K05adsp70-u:2640: tatra buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvān saṃsāraparyāpannān
K05adsp70-u:2641: tataḥ pāpakād dṛṣṭigatān vivecayanti. vivecya aniyate [f. 298b] rāśau pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
K05adsp70-u:2642: tatra pratiṣṭhāpitā punar apāyeṣu upapadyante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K05adsp70-u:2644: yasya pariśodhanāt sattvānāṃ na kvacin niketo bhavati. laukikeṣu vā dharmeṣu lokottareṣu
K05adsp70-u:2645: vā dharmeṣu sāsraveṣu vā dharmeṣv anāsraveṣu vā dharmeṣu saṃskṛteṣu vā dharmeṣv asaṃskṛteṣu vā dharmeṣu,
K05adsp70-u:2646: yāvat sarvasattvā niyatā bhavanty anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. ((77))
K05adsp70-u:2648: (VIII 5,16) atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K05adsp70-u:2649: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ atha aniyataḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2651: niyataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na aniyataḥ.
K05adsp70-u:2653: āha: katamatra rāśau niyata. śrāvakarāśau vā pratyekabuddharāśau vā buddharāśau vā?
K05adsp70-u:2655: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā niyataḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā,
K05adsp70-u:2657: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyata utāho 'vaivartikaḥ utāho caramabhavikaḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2659: prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyata avaivartiko niyataś caramabhaviko niyataḥ.
K05adsp70-u:2660: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan niyato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo apāyeṣu upapadyate?
K05adsp70-u:2662: no hīdaṃ subhūte. tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv aṣṭamako vā srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā arhan vā pratyekabuddho vā apāyeṣu upapadyate?
K05adsp70-u:2665: evam eva subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānaṃ dadañc
K05adsp70-u:2666: chīlaṃ rakṣan kṣāntyā saṃpādayan vīryaṃ vārabhamāṇaḥ samādhiṃ samāpadyamānaḥ prajñāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2667: bhāvayaṃ. maitrīkaruṇāmuditā-upekṣāṃ sarvasattveṣu bhāvayati sarva akuśaladharmaprahāṇāya
K05adsp70-u:2668: tiṣṭhati. so 'pāyeṣu upapadyeta iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. dīrghāyuṣkeṣu vā deveṣu
K05adsp70-u:2669: upapadyeta iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. yatra vā apracāraḥ kuśaladharmāṇām eḍamūkeṣu
K05adsp70-u:2670: vā janapadeṣu upapadyeta iti. nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. dasyuṣu mleccheṣu pratyanteṣu
K05adsp70-u:2671: vā janapadeṣu upapadyeta iti. yatra agatiś catasṛṇāṃ parṣadan nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
K05adsp70-u:2672: mithyādṛṣṭikeṣu vā kuleṣu upapadyeta iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tatra ca upapadyeta
K05adsp70-u:2673: yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabda iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ (AdSPG II 108)
K05adsp70-u:2674: vidyate. akriyādṛṣṭiṃ vā pated iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. api tu khalu subhūte prathamacittotpādam
K05adsp70-u:2675: upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitaḥ adhyāśayena,
K05adsp70-u:2676: dasākuśalāḥ karmapathān adhyāpadyeta iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
K05adsp70-u:2677: āha: yadi bhagavam bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ kuśalamūlasamanvāgataḥ yaduta apratirūpeṣu
K05adsp70-u:2678: sthāneṣu nopapadyate. tad yāni imāni tathāgatena ātmanas tiryaggatijātakāni nirdiṣṭāni.
K05adsp70-u:2679: imāni punas tatra kuśalamūlaṃ kva gatāni?
K05adsp70-u:2681: na punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'śubhenakarmaṇā tiryaggatāv upadadyate. api
K05adsp70-u:2682: tu yena yena ātmabhāvena sattvānām arthaḥ kartavyaṃs taṃ tam eva ātmabhāvaṃ saṃcintya
K05adsp70-u:2683: sattvānām arthāya parigṛhṇāti. kiṃ punaḥ subhūte asty arhatāṃ vā pratyekabuddhānāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2684: vā tad upāyakauśalaṃ yena upāyakauśalena [f. 299a] samanvāgatas tiryagyonigatau6(upapannaḥ syāt?
K05adsp70-u:2687: tathāgatasya tad upāyakauśalam asti yena tatra upapannaḥ syād. ye 'sya vadhāya parākramanti
K05adsp70-u:2688: tān anuttarāyāṃ kṣāntau samādāpayati vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati. teṣāṃ sattvānām eva
K05adsp70-u:2689: arthāya ātmānaṃ ca parityajati. na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viheṭhaṃ karoti. tad anena
K05adsp70-u:2690: te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ. yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām arthāya
K05adsp70-u:2691: mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayann anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye tiryagyonāv vyupapadyate.
K05adsp70-u:2693: āha: katameṣu bhagavaṃ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imān evaṃrūpān ātmabhāvān parigṛhṇāti?
K05adsp70-u:2695: katamaṃ subhūte kuśalo dharmo yo bodhisattvena (AdSPG II 109)
K05adsp70-u:2697: sarvakuśaladharmaparipūrir anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhi. tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K05adsp70-u:2698: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇena na kaścit kuśalo dharmo yo
K05adsp70-u:2699: na paripūrayitavyaḥ. na hi sa kaścit kuśalo dharmo yena aparipūritena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir
K05adsp70-u:2700: abhisaṃbudhyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K05adsp70-u:2701: prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvakuśaladharmaparipūryaiḥ śikṣitavyaṃ. yatra śikṣitvā
K05adsp70-u:2703: āha: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tāvac chukladharmasamanvāgataḥ āryeṇa anāsraveṇa dharmeṇa apāyeṣu upapadyate. tiryagyonau
K05adsp70-u:2706: āha: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugataḥ. āryo 'nāsravas tathāgataḥ.
K05adsp70-u:2708: kiṃ punas tathāgatas tairyagyonikaṃ prāṇinam abhinirmimītaḥ yam abhinirmāya buddhakāryaṃ kuryāt?
K05adsp70-u:2714: kiṃ punas tathāgatas tairyagyonikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavet?
K05adsp70-u:2717: evam eva subhūte āryeṇa anāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃcintya
K05adsp70-u:2718: tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti. yena ātmabhāvena sattvān paripācayati. yathārhaṃ yathāyogyaṃ.
K05adsp70-u:2719: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann arhan nirmitam abhinirmiṇoti. yo 'bhinirmito 'rhankarma kuryād,
K05adsp70-u:2722: evam etat subhūte evam etat. evam eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ āryeṇa anāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgataḥ saṃcintya (AdSPG II 110)
K05adsp70-u:2723: tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti. yena ātmabhāvena sattvānāṃ buddhakāryaṃ karoti.
K05adsp70-u:2724: na ca tena tathārūpeṇa ātmabhāvena duḥkhito bhavati. na duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhavati.
K05adsp70-u:2725: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yāṃ māyākāro māyān darśayati. hastivigrahāṃ vā aśvavigrahāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2726: vā balīvardavigrahāṃ vā anyāṃ vā vividhāṃ māyāṃ darśayati. api nu te hastivigrahā
K05adsp70-u:2727: bhavanty aśvavigrahā vā valīvardavigrahā vā anyā vā vividhā prāṇijātaya?
K05adsp70-u:2730: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇa anāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgato bhavati.
K05adsp70-u:2731: saṃcintya tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti. yathārūpeṇa ātmabhāvena sattvānām arthaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2732: karoti. na ca tathārūpāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhavati.
K05adsp70-u:2734: mahopāyakauśalaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yo hi nāma bhagavann āryeṇa
K05adsp70-u:2735: jñānena samanvāgato yena yena ātmabhāvena śaknoti sattvānām arthaḥ kartuṃ taṃ tam
K05adsp70-u:2737: (VIII 5,17) katameṣu bhagavaṃc chukleṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo [f. 299b] imāny evaṃrūpāny upāyakauśalāni karoti na ca tair
K05adsp70-u:2739: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imāny evaṃrūpāny upāyakauśalāni
K05adsp70-u:2740: karoti. yair upāyakauśalai pūrvasyān diśi dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt
K05adsp70-u:2741: tiryak samantād daśasu dikṣv aikaikasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2742: kṛtyaṃ karoti. na ca tena tatra kiṃcit saṃspṛśyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2743: tathā hi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvathaiva dharmaṃ nopalabhate. yo vā saṃspṛśyeta yena vā saṃpṛśyeta yatra vā saṃspṛśyeta. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2744: tathā hi sarva ete trayo dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ. na ca śūnyatā śūnyatāṃ saṃspṛśati. na api śūnyatāṃ kaścid dharma saṃspṛśati. na api śūnyatā saṃspṛśyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2745: tathā hi śūnyatā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate. iyaṃ (AdSPG II 111)
K05adsp70-u:2746: sā anupalaṃbhaśūnyatā yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
K05adsp70-u:2747: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyām eva sthitvā na anyeṣu dharmeṣu?
K05adsp70-u:2749: asti punaḥ subhūte kaścid dharmo yo na prajñāpāramitāyām antargataḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2750: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ. prajñāpāramitā svabhāvena śūnyā kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā antargatā?
K05adsp70-u:2751: na ca bhagavaṃc chūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharmo 'ntargato vā na vā antargataḥ.
K05adsp70-u:2753: na punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmā sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2760: tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K05adsp70-u:2761: yat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva idam evaṃrūpam upāyakauśalaṃ kurute.
K05adsp70-u:2763: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā abhijñāpāramitām abhinirmāti?
K05adsp70-u:2764: yāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn gacchati. tatra
K05adsp70-u:2765: lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti
K05adsp70-u:2766: tāṃ. paryupāste dharmaṃ ca śṛṇoti. tatra ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlāny avaropayati?
K05adsp70-u:2767: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K05adsp70-u:2768: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān
K05adsp70-u:2769: lokadhātavas tāṃ sarvāṃ śūnyā iti paśyati. ye 'pi tatra buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi
K05adsp70-u:2770: buddhā bhagavantas svabhāvaśunyā4na anyatra nāmasaṃketena prajñaptim upādāya nirdiśyante.
K05adsp70-u:2772: yadi te lokadhātavo na svabhāvena śūnyāḥ abhaviṣyaṃs,
K05adsp70-u:2773: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs,
K05adsp70-u:2774: te 'pi prajñaptisamudācārā na svabhāvena śūnyā (AdSPG II 112)
K05adsp70-u:2776: tat prādesikī śūnyatābhaviṣyat. yasmān na prādeśikī śūnyatā tasmāt sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2777: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhijñāpāramitām
K05adsp70-u:2778: abhinirharati. yāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā divyaṃ cakṣur abhinirharati. divyaśrotram ṛddhiṃ
K05adsp70-u:2780: na ca vinā abhijñābhir bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śakyam anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ. ///
K05adsp70-u:2782: [f. 301a] tasmād bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya abhijñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhir antargatā;
K05adsp70-u:2784: sa mārgayamāṇo divyena cakṣuṣā ātmanas tān kuśalān dharmān paśyati. paraṃ ca kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu niyojayati. na ca teṣu kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu abhiniveṣṭhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2785: tathā hi te sarve kuśalā dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā. na hi śūnyatāyā kvacid abhiniviśate.
K05adsp70-u:2786: yad abhiniviśya āsvādayet. nirāsvādā hi śūnyatā. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2787: caran divyaṃ cakṣur abhinirharati. yena divyena cakṣuṣā sarvadharmāṃc chūnyā iti paśyati,
K05adsp70-u:2788: tat punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān dharmatām āgamya karma abhiniropayati. yayā
K05adsp70-u:2789: karmābhiniruptyā sattvānān dharman deśayati. na punaḥ sattvaṃ na sattvaprajñaptim
K05adsp70-u:2790: upalabhate. ity anupalaṃbhayogena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ abhijñāpāramitām abhinirmāti.
K05adsp70-u:2791: yābhir abhijñābhir ye 'bhijñākaraṇīyān dharmān tān karoti. tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K05adsp70-u:2792: divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhena atikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām
K05adsp70-u:2793: uttarasyām adhastād diśi vidikṣv ūrdhvam [**] tiryag lokadhātūṃ paśyati. sa tatra
K05adsp70-u:2795: karoti. yadi vā dānena yadi vā śīlena yadi vā kṣāntyā yadi vā vīryeṇa yadi vā samādhmā
K05adsp70-u:2796: yadi vā prajñāyā yadi vā saptatṛṃśatā bodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ yadi vā dhyānāpramāṇārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattibhir
K05adsp70-u:2797: yadi vā śrāvakadharmair yadi vā. pratyekabuddhadharmair yadi vā bodhisattvadharmair
K05adsp70-u:2798: yadi vā buddhadharmais teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyakaro bhavati. tatra ye sattvā matsariṇas
K05adsp70-u:2799: teṣām evan dharman deśayati. dadadhvad dānan,
K05adsp70-u:2801: na hi dāridryeṇa śakyam ātmano 'py arthaḥ kartuṃ. prāg eva parasya,
K05adsp70-u:2802: tad yūyam ātmanā ca duḥkitā bhaviṣyathaḥ paraṃ ca duḥkhayiṣyatha,
K05adsp70-u:2803: mā dāridryeṇa abhibhūtā anyonya māṃsāni khādanto na parimokṣyadhve tṛbhyo 'pāyebhyaḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2804: ye duḥśīlā sattvās teṣām evan dharman deśayati. duḥkhaṃ hi bhoḥ puruṣā dauḥśīlyaṃ,
K05adsp70-u:2805: na hi duḥśīlena śakyam ātmano 'py arthaḥ kartuṃ,
K05adsp70-u:2806: prāg eva parasya. dauḥśīlyasya yo vipākaḥ sa narakā vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā,
K05adsp70-u:2807: tad yūyaṃ tṛṣv apāyeṣu prapatitā. ātmānam eva na śakyā arthaṃ kartuṃ prāg eva param,
K05adsp70-u:2808: tad yuṣmābhir ekadauḥśīlyasya cittasya apy avakāśo na dātavyo,
K05adsp70-u:2809: mā paścāt tāpino 'bhūt. ye sattvās parasparaṃ vyāpannacittās teṣām evan dharman deśayati.
K05adsp70-u:2810: mā yūyam anyonyaṃ vyāpadyadhvaṃ. kṣubhitacittānāṃ satāṃ na kaścit kuśalo dharmaḥ prādurbhavati,
K05adsp70-u:2811: tad yuṣmākam anyonyakṣubhitacittānāṃ satāṃ sthānam etad vidyate. yan narakopapattir bhaved vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā,
K05adsp70-u:2812: haṃta yuṣmābhir ekacittam api na kṣobhayitavyaṃ,
K05adsp70-u:2813: prāg eva anyeṣāṃ akuśalānāṃ cittānām avakāśo na dātavyaḥ iti. ye kusīdās tāṃ vīrye niyojayati,
K05adsp70-u:2814: evaṃ yāvad ye vikṣiptacittās tān samādhau niyojayati. ye duṣprajñās tān prajñāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2815: niyojayati. ye rāgacaritās tān aśubhāyāṃ niyojayati. ye dveṣacaritās tāṃ maitryāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2816: niyojayati. [f. 301b] ye mohacaritās tāṃ pratītyasamutpāde niyojayati. ye kumārge
K05adsp70-u:2817: prasthitās tān mārge niyojayati. yadi vā śrāvakamārge yadi vā pratyekabuddhamārge
K05adsp70-u:2819: yatra yūyam abhiniviṣṭās te dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā,
K05adsp70-u:2820: na hi svabhāvena śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu śakyam abhiniveṣṭuṃ. anabhiniviṣṭā ca (AdSPG II 114)
K05adsp70-u:2821: śūnyatā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann
K05adsp70-u:2822: abhijñāsu sthitvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti. nāsti subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena śakyam abhijñāsv asthitvā sattvānāṃ dharman deśayituṃ,
K05adsp70-u:2823: utpathaprasthitā vā sattvā mārgam avatārayituṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. yathā subhūte
K05adsp70-u:2824: pakṣī śakunir apakṣako na śaknoty ākāśena krāmitum evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva
K05adsp70-u:2825: anāgamya abhijñā na śaknoti. dharman deśayituṃ. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena
K05adsp70-u:2826: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā abhijñā abhinirhartavyāḥ. sa ābhir abhijñābhir
K05adsp70-u:2827: abhinirhartābhir yam ākāṅkṣiśyati sattvānām arthaṃ kartuṃ taṃ sukhina kariṣyati.
K05adsp70-u:2828: divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānādīvālukopamān lokadhātūn drakṣyati. tāṃś ca tatra sattvān
K05adsp70-u:2829: upapannān drakṣyati. dṛṣṭvā ca tān sattvān ṛdhyā gatvā cetasaiva cittaṃ prajñāsyati,
K05adsp70-u:2830: prajñāya tathaiva dharman deśayiṣyati. yadi vā dānakathāṃ yadi vā yāvan nairyānikīṃ
K05adsp70-u:2831: kathāṃ. sa divyena śrotradhātunā ubhau śabdau śroṣyati. yaduta divyāṃś ca mānuṣyakāṃś
K05adsp70-u:2832: ca. tatra ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
K05adsp70-u:2833: lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti. sa tena divyena śrotradhātunā tān
K05adsp70-u:2834: dharmān śroṣyati. śrutvā ca tathātvāya udgrahīṣyati. tathātvāya udgṛhya ananyathātvāya
K05adsp70-u:2835: dharman deśayiṣyati. dānakathāṃ yāvan nairyāṇikakathāṃ. tasya cetaḥparyāyajñānaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2836: suviśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati. sa tena cetaḥparyāyajñānena sattvānāṃ cittaṃ prajñāsyati.
K05adsp70-u:2837: teṣān tathātvāya dharman deśayiṣyati. dānakathāṃ yāvan nairyāṇikakathāṃ. so 'nekavidhaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2838: pūrvenivāsam anusmariṣyati anya ātmano 'pi parasya api. sa tena pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānena
K05adsp70-u:2839: evaṃ jñāsyaty evaṃnāmakās te 'bhūvan. paurvakās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā saśrāvakās,
K05adsp70-u:2840: tatra ye sattvā pūrvenivāsānusmṛtyadhimuktā bhaviṣyanti. teṣāṃ tathātvāya dharman
K05adsp70-u:2841: deśayiṣyati. dānakathāṃ yāvan nairyāṇikakathāṃ. sa ṛddhyā anekān vividhāṃ lokadhātūṃ
K05adsp70-u:2842: gatvā buddhāṃ bhagavataḥ paryupāsiṣyate paryupāsya abhijñānena sattvānāṃ dharman
K05adsp70-u:2843: deśayiṣyati. dānakathāṃ yāvan nairyāṇikakathāṃ. sa āsravakṣayajñānena suviditena
K05adsp70-u:2844: sattvānān dharman deśayiṣyati. yadi vā dānakathāṃ yadi vā nairyāṇikakathāṃ. evaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2845: khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca (AdSPG II 115)
K05adsp70-u:2846: ratā abhijñā abhinirhartavyā. sa ebhir abhijñābhiḥ suparicitābhi yaṃ yam eva ātmabhāvaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2847: parigṛhītum ākāṅkṣiṣyati. taṃ tam eva ātmabhāvaṃ parigrahīsyati. sa na ca tena sukhena
K05adsp70-u:2848: vā duḥkhena vā sumanā vā durmanā vā bhaviṣyati. naiva asya anunayapratighau bhaviṣyatha.
K05adsp70-u:2849: tadyathāpi nāma tathāgatanirmitaḥ [f. 302a] puruṣaḥ sarvakṛtyāni karoti. na ca tena
K05adsp70-u:2850: sukhena vā duḥkhena vā kliśyate. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2851: caratā abhijñāvikrīḍitena bhavitavyaṃ. yathā vikrīḍamāno buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiṣyati.
K05adsp70-u:2852: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyati. na punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena apariśodhite
K05adsp70-u:2853: buddhakṣetre aparipāciteṣu sattveṣu śakyam anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2854: nāsti subhūte mārgāṅgavikalasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
K05adsp70-u:2856: katamāni bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgāṅgāni. yāni yāni bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paripūrya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
K05adsp70-u:2857: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K05adsp70-u:2859: āha: te punar bhagavan katame kuśaladharmā mārgāṅgāni. yair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbudhyate?
K05adsp70-u:2861: prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitā kuśalo dharmas tatra yā akalpanā yad dadan
K05adsp70-u:2862: na kalapyati. idaṃ dānan asmai dadāmy ahan dadāmi ity etat trayaṃ na kalpayati. svabhāvaśunyatām upādāya,
K05adsp70-u:2863: yayā pāramitayā ātmanā ca tarati paraṃ ca tārayati saṃsārārṇavāt. ime te kuśaladharmā
K05adsp70-u:2864: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarasyā samyaksaṃbodhaye mārgo yena mārgena atītānāgatapratyutpannā
K05adsp70-u:2865: bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tīrṇās taranti tariṣyanti ca (AdSPG II 116)
K05adsp70-u:2866: saṃsārārṇavāt. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā samādhipāramitā prajñāpāramitā catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni:
K05adsp70-u:2867: catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni. catvārarddhipādāḥ
K05adsp70-u:2868: pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni.
K05adsp70-u:2869: caturdaśaśūnyatā aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattayo dhāraṇīmukhāni samādhimukhāni.
K05adsp70-u:2871: yāvantaḥ kecid bodhimārgā ime te kuśalā dharmā ye bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripūrayitavyā
K05adsp70-u:2872: yāṃ paripūrya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. yām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati. ((78))
K05adsp70-u:2875: yadi bhagavann ime dharmā bodhisattvadharmās tad buddhadharmās punar katame?
K05adsp70-u:2877: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha. yadi ime dharmā bodhisattvadharmās tad buddhadharmāḥ
K05adsp70-u:2878: punaḥ katama iti. ima eva subhūte buddhadharmā yademān dharmān sarvākārair abhisaṃbudhyate.
K05adsp70-u:2881: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmān ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā abhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2882: ayaṃ viśeṣo bodhisattvasya ca tathāgatasya ca arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte anya eva pratipannako anya eva phalastaḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2883: na ca na tāv ubhāv āryapudgalau,
K05adsp70-u:2886: tathāgatas punar arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmeṣv anandhakāratā prāpta,
K05adsp70-u:2887: iyaṃ subhūte viśeso bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgatasya ca arhata samyaksaṃbuddhasya.
K05adsp70-u:2889: yadi punar bhagavann ime dharmāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2890: svalaksaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu kuto viśeṣo nānākaraṇaṃ vā upalabhyate?
K05adsp70-u:2891: ayaṃ nairayiko 'yaṃ tairyagyoniko 'yaṃ yamalaukikaḥ ayaṃ devo 'yaṃ manuṣya ayaṃ gotrabhūr
K05adsp70-u:2892: ayam aṣṭamaka ayaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho
K05adsp70-u:2893: 'yaṃ bodhisattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. yathaiva bhagavann ime pudgalā
K05adsp70-u:2894: nopalabhyante. tathaiva bhagavaṃ. karma nopalabhyate. yathaiva karma nopalabhyate
K05adsp70-u:2896: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K05adsp70-u:2897: evam etat subhūte evam etat tathā yathā vadasi. svalaksaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na karma
K05adsp70-u:2898: na vipāka upalabhyate. ye punaḥ subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān na jānanti te karma
K05adsp70-u:2899: abhisaṃskurvanti. duścaritaṃ vā sucaritaṃ vā sāsravaṃ vā anāsravaṃ vā. te duścaritena
K05adsp70-u:2900: karmaṇā triṣv apāyeṣu prapatanti. sucaritena devamanuṣyeṣu upapadyante. acchidreṇa
K05adsp70-u:2901: karmaṇā rūpadhātau vā arūpyadhātau vā copapayante. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2902: caran yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carann acchidracāri imān bodhisattvadharmān
K05adsp70-u:2903: utpādayati. yān utpādya bodhyaṅgaparivārasahagataṃ vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno
K05adsp70-u:2904: 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām arthaṇi karoti.
K05adsp70-u:2905: yo 'rtha. kṛto na punar vipraṇaśyati. yasya vipraṇāśāt pañcagatike saṃsāre prapatet.
K05adsp70-u:2906: aha: kiṃ punar bhagavatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāra upalabdhaḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2908: āha: kiṃ punas tathāgatena kṛṣṇā vā śuklā vā akṛṣṇāśuklā vā dharmāḥ upalabdhāḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2911: āha: yadi nopalabdhā. kuto narakā vā tiryagyonir vā yamalokā vā prajñaptāḥ kuto devamanuṣyāḥ
K05adsp70-u:2912: prajñaptāḥ kutaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddhaḥ kuto bodhisattvaḥ
K05adsp70-u:2915: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte ete sattvā svalakṣaṇaśūnyāṃ. sarvadharmāṃ jānanti?
K05adsp70-u:2918: yadi punaḥ subhūte sattvā evaṃ jānīyuḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyā dharmā iti. tan na bodhisattvo
K05adsp70-u:2919: mahāsattvo 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye 'saṃpratiṣṭhamāno na sattvāṃ mocayet tribhyo
K05adsp70-u:2920: 'pāyebhyo yāvat saṃsāragatibhyaḥ. yasmāt tarhi subhūte sattvā na jānanti svalakṣaṇaśūnyān
K05adsp70-u:2921: dharmās te aprajānanto na parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvas
K05adsp70-u:2922: teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāc chrutvā svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān sattvānām arthāya
K05adsp70-u:2923: anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhate. neme dharmās tathā saṃvidyante yathā
K05adsp70-u:2925: tad ime sattvāḥ asataḥ asaṃvidyamānān dharmān svataḥ kalpayitvā upalabhya:
K05adsp70-u:2926: asattve sattvasaṃjñinaḥ arūpe rūpasaṃjñina. avedanāyāṃ vedanāsaṃjñinaḥ asaṃjñāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2929: viparyāsair viparyastacittā. kāyena vācā manasā karma abhisaṃskurvanti. te pañcagatikāt
K05adsp70-u:2930: saṃsārān na parimucyante. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ sarvān
K05adsp70-u:2931: antargatān kuśalān dharmān kṛtvā bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati. yāṃ cārikāṃ carann anuttarāṃ
K05adsp70-u:2933: (VIII 5,21). abhisaṃbudhya duḥkhaṃ ca duḥkhasamudayaṃ ca duḥkhanirodhaṃ ca duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ ca pratipādam ācaṣṭe (AdSPG II 119)
K05adsp70-u:2934: deśayati. prajñapayati prasthāpayati. vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti saṃprakāśayati.
K05adsp70-u:2935: tatra caturṣv āryasatyeṣu sarve 'ntargatā kuśalā dharmā ye kecid bodhipakṣyā dharmāyair
K05adsp70-u:2936: bodhipakṣyair dharmais trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati. katameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ?
K05adsp70-u:2938: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ prādurbhāvāt sattvāḥ parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt.
K05adsp70-u:2940: kiṃ punar bhagavan duḥkhajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavaty atha duḥkhena,
K05adsp70-u:2944: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K05adsp70-u:2945: na subhūte duḥkhajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavati na duḥkhena,
K05adsp70-u:2946: na samudayajñānena parmirvāṇaṃ bhavati. na samudayena. na duḥkhanirodhajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2947: bhavati. na duḥkhanirodhena. na mārgajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavati na mārgeṇa. yā
K05adsp70-u:2948: punaḥ subhūte caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ samatā tat parinirvāṇam uktaṃ mayā,
K05adsp70-u:2949: na puna duḥkhajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavati. na duḥkhena na samudayajñānena na samudayena na duḥkhanirodhajñānena na duḥkhanirodhena na mārgajñānena na mārgeṇa parinirvāṇaṃ bhavati.
K05adsp70-u:2950: āha: katamā eṣaṃ bhagavaṃs caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ samatā?
K05adsp70-u:2952: yatra subhūte na duḥkhaṃ na duḥkhajñānaṃ na samudayo na samudayajñānaṃ na nirodho
K05adsp70-u:2953: na nirodhajñānaṃ na mārgo na mārgajñānaṃ. yaiṣāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ tathatā avitathatā
K05adsp70-u:2954: dharmatā. dharmadhātur dharmaniyāmatā dharmasthitā. yad utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād
K05adsp70-u:2955: vā tathāgatānāṃ sthita eva dhātur yaduta dharmadhātuḥ asaṃpramoṣāya aparihāṇāya saṃvartate.
K05adsp70-u:2956: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhāya carati. na ca
K05adsp70-u:2959: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhavavantam etad avocat:
K05adsp70-u:2960: kathaṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhāya
K05adsp70-u:2961: carati. yathā caraṃ satyāny anubudhyate. abhisaṃbudhya tathātvaṃ pratividhyati. yathā
K05adsp70-u:2962: pratividhyan naiva śrāvakabhūmau patati na pratyekabuddhabhūmau patati. bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati?
K05adsp70-u:2963: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K05adsp70-u:2964: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na tān dharmāṃs tathā
K05adsp70-u:2965: paśyati. yathā paśyaṃ kiṃcid dharmam upalabheta. anupalabhamānaḥ sarvadharmāṃc chūnyā
K05adsp70-u:2966: iti paśyati. satyaparyāpannāṃś ca asatyaparyāpannāñ ca tān sarvān śūnyā iti paśyati.
K05adsp70-u:2967: sa evaṃ paśyann avakrāntaniyāmo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvagotrabhūbhūmau
K05adsp70-u:2968: sthito bhavati. sa bodhisattvagotrabhūbhūmau sthitvā na mūrdhna nipātaṃ patati. yena
K05adsp70-u:2969: [f. 303b] mūrdhna nipātena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati. sa iha
K05adsp70-u:2970: bodhisattvagotrabhūmau sthitvā catvāri dhyānāny utpādayati catvāry apramāṇāni catasraḥ
K05adsp70-u:2971: ārūpyasamāpattīḥ. sa iha śamathabhūmau sthitvā sarvadharmān pravicinoti. catvāry
K05adsp70-u:2972: āryasatyāni prativibudhyati. sa ca duḥkhañ ca parijānāti. na ca duḥkhārambaṇāṃ cittam
K05adsp70-u:2973: utpādayati. samudayaṃ ca prajāhati. na ca samudayārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati. nirodhaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2974: ca sākṣātkaroti. na ca nirodhārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati. mārgaṃ ca bhāvayati na
K05adsp70-u:2975: ca mārgārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati. anyatra bodhinimnena cittena sarvadharmān yathāvatvaṃ paśyati.
K05adsp70-u:2980: svalaksaṇaśūnyatā. so 'nayaivaṃrūpayā vipaśyanayā sarvadharmāṃc chūnyā iti vipaśyati. na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvaṃ paśyati. yatra bhāve sthitvā bodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta.
K05adsp70-u:2981: āha: evaṃ sati bhagavann abhāvaś ca bodhiḥ?
K05adsp70-u:2983: evam etat subhūte evam etad. yathā vadasi. abhāvaś (AdSPG II 121)
K05adsp70-u:2984: ca bodhiḥ, sā na buddhaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair na arhadbhir nāpi tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair,
K05adsp70-u:2985: ya iha bodhāya caranti. anyatra sattvā na jānanti na paśyanti yathātvaṃ. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati. ((79))
K05adsp70-u:2989: te na buddhai kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair na arhadbhir na anāgāmibhir na sakṛdāgāmibhir
K05adsp70-u:2990: na srotaāpannair na pratipannakair nāpi tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ kṛtā ya iha
K05adsp70-u:2991: bodhāya caranti. tat kuta esān dharmāṇāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā vyavasthānaṃ vā prajñāyate,
K05adsp70-u:2992: ime nairayikā ime tairyagyonikā ime yāmalaukikā ime devā ime manuṣyāḥ,
K05adsp70-u:2993: anena vā karmaṇā narakās tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ anena karmaṇā devāḥ anena karmaṇā
K05adsp70-u:2994: manuṣyāḥ anena karmaṇā brahmakāyikā devāḥ yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanā devāḥ.
K05adsp70-u:2995: anena karmaṇā srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddhāḥ anena karmaṇā
K05adsp70-u:2996: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena karmaṇā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. abhāvasya
K05adsp70-u:2997: hi bhagavan na kācit kriyā yayā kriyā narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2998: vā devamānuṣyaṃ vā yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu vā deveṣu upapadyeta. srotaāpattiphalaṃ
K05adsp70-u:2999: vā anuprāpnuyāt sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vā,
K05adsp70-u:3000: bodhisattvo vā mahāsattvo bodhimārge caret tathāgato vā 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ vā anuprāpnuyād yām anuprāpya sattvāṃ saṃsārāṃ
K05adsp70-u:3002: evam etat subhūte evam etat tathā yathā vadasi,
K05adsp70-u:3003: abhāvasya hi subhūte na karma na kriyā na phalaṃ. bālo hi subhūte (AdSPG II 122)
K05adsp70-u:3004: aśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ āryadharmeṣv akovidaḥ abhāvasvabhāvān dharmān na prajānāti.
K05adsp70-u:3005: sa viparyāsasamutthitena cittena vividhaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti. tasya tādṛśa eva ātmabhāvo
K05adsp70-u:3006: abhinirvartate. yadi vā narakeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vā yāvan
K05adsp70-u:3007: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu [f. 304a] deveṣu. yāvad abhāvasya na karma na kriyā na
K05adsp70-u:3008: phalaṃ. yaḥ punar abhāvaḥ abhāva eva saḥ. yat punar subhūtir evam āha. abhāvasya
K05adsp70-u:3009: hi na kācit kriyā yayā kriyayā yāvat srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā anuprāpnuyāt. sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ
K05adsp70-u:3010: vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vā,
K05adsp70-u:3011: bodhisattvo vā mahāsattvo mārgākārajñatāyāñc caret tathāgato vārhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
K05adsp70-u:3012: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti. yām anuprāpya sattvān saṃsārān mocayet. tat kiṃ
K05adsp70-u:3013: manyase subhūte na abhāvo mārgaḥ abhāvaḥ srotaāpattiphalam abhāvaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam
K05adsp70-u:3014: abhāvo 'nāgāmiphalam abhāvo 'rhattvam abhāvaḥ pratyekabodhihr abhāvo yāvat sarvākārajñatā.
K05adsp70-u:3015: āha: abhāvo bhagavan mārgaḥ abhāva srotaāpattiphalam abhāvaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam abhāvo 'nāgāmiphalam abhāvo 'rhatvam abhāvaḥ pratyekabodhir abhāvo yāvat sarvākārajñatā.
K05adsp70-u:3017: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte abhāvo dharmaḥ abhāvan dharmam anuprāpnoti?
K05adsp70-u:3020: iti hi subhūte. yaś ca abhāvo yaś ca mārga ubhāv etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktauv arūpiṇāv anidarśanāv apratighāv ekalakṣaṇau yaduta
K05adsp70-u:3021: tatra subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvāṃś
K05adsp70-u:3022: caturbhir viparyāsair abhiniviṣṭāṃ pañcaskandheṣu anitye nityasaṃjñīno duḥkhe sukhasaṃjñīnaḥ
K05adsp70-u:3023: anātmāny ātmasaṃjñinaḥ. aśubhe śubhasaṃjñīno bhāvābhiviniṣṭās tato bhāvād vivecayati.
K05adsp70-u:3025: kaccid bhagavan vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhāvaṃs tathatā avitathatā yatra sthitvā bālapṛthagjanā vastv ity abhiniviśante. bhūtaṃ bhāvas tathatā avitathatā. (AdSPG II 123)
K05adsp70-u:3026: yadi nāsti kathaṃ karma abhisaṃskurvanti. yena karmaṇā pañcagatikāt saṃsārān na parimucyante?
K05adsp70-u:3028: nāsti subhūte antaśo balāgrakoṭīnikṣepamātram api vastu yatra sthitvā bālapṛthagjanā
K05adsp70-u:3029: karmābhisaṃskurvanti anyatra viparyāsena. tena hi subhūte upamān te kariṣyāmi yāvad
K05adsp70-u:3030: eva asyaivārthasya bhūyasyāmātrayā paripūraye yathāpaṇḍitājānīyuḥ. tat kiṃ manyase
K05adsp70-u:3031: subhūte kaccit svapnadarśino vastv asti. yatra sthitvā svapnadarśī pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ paricārayet?
K05adsp70-u:3032: āha: svapna eva tāvan nāsti. kutaḥ punaḥ svapnadarśī,
K05adsp70-u:3035: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaccit punar dharmo 'sti saṃskṛto vā asaṃskṛto vā sāsravo vā anāsravo vā yo na svapnopamaḥ?
K05adsp70-u:3036: āha: nāsti bhagavaṃ. kaścid dharma saṃskṛto vā asaṃskṛto vā sāsravo vā anāsravo vā yo na svapnopamaḥ.
K05adsp70-u:3041: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte svapne mārgabhāvanā asti,
K05adsp70-u:3042: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta?
K05adsp70-u:3044: avastukaḥ sa bhagavan dharmaḥ aprajñaptikaḥ aprajñapanīyaḥ sarvavyāhārapadavyañjanaiḥ.
K05adsp70-u:3046: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yadā ādarśamaṇḍale pratibimban dṛśyate kaccit tasya vastv
K05adsp70-u:3047: asti yat karmābhisaṃskuryāt yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ
K05adsp70-u:3050: avastukaṃ bhagavan pratibimbaṃ anyatra bālānām ullāpakaṃ,
K05adsp70-u:3052: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā. devamanuṣyān vā?
K05adsp70-u:3054: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaccit tasya mārgabhāvanā asti. yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta?
K05adsp70-u:3055: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann avastukaṃś ca bhagavan pratibimbaṃ tat kuto 'sya mārgabhāvanā bhaviṣyati. yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na
K05adsp70-u:3057: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā sā pratiśrutkā vanagahanaparvatakandaraprāgbhārato niścarati. kaccit tasyā pratiśrutkāyā vastv asti yat karmābhisaṃskuryāt,
K05adsp70-u:3058: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya. narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamakokaṃ vā?
K05adsp70-u:3059: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavam avastukā bhagavaṃ. sā pratiśrutkā kutas tasyāḥ karma bhaviṣyati.
K05adsp70-u:3060: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyeṣu
K05adsp70-u:3061: vā upapadyeta. yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu vā deveṣu upapadyeta.
K05adsp70-u:3063: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaccit tasyāḥ pratiśrutkāyā mārgabhāvanā asti:
K05adsp70-u:3064: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta?
K05adsp70-u:3065: āha: atyantatayā bhagavan saiva pratiṣrutkā nāsti. kutaḥ punas tasyā mārgabhāvanā bhaviṣyati. yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na
K05adsp70-u:3067: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yeyaṃ marīcikāyām anudake udakasaṃjñā. anadyāṃ nadīsaṃjñā.
K05adsp70-u:3068: anagare nagarasaṃjñā. anudyāne udyānasaṃjñā tat kiṃ tasyāṃ marīcikāyā saṃjñāyāṃ karma
K05adsp70-u:3069: asti yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyeṣu
K05adsp70-u:3070: vā upapadyeta yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu vā deveṣu upapadyeta?
K05adsp70-u:3071: āha: atyantatayā bhagavaṃ marīcikāyām udakan nāsti. na nadī,
K05adsp70-u:3072: na nagara udyānam anyatra saṃjñāviparyāsaś cakṣuṣo moha. kutas tasyā karma bhaviṣyati.
K05adsp70-u:3073: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyeṣu
K05adsp70-u:3074: vā upapadyeta. yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu vā deveṣu upapadyeta.
K05adsp70-u:3076: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaccit tasyā viparyastasaṃjñāyā mārgabhāvanā asti. yān mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta?
K05adsp70-u:3077: āha: na bhagavan viparyastāyāḥ saṃjñāyā mārgabhāvanā asti. yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
K05adsp70-u:3080: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yāṃ māyākāro vividhān māyām abhinirminoti. yadi vā hastikāyaṃ
K05adsp70-u:3081: yadi vā aśvakāyaṃ yadi vā balīvardakāyaṃ. yadi vā pattikāyaṃ. yadi vā rathakāyaṃ
K05adsp70-u:3082: yadi vā strikāyaṃ yadi vā puruṣakāyaṃ,
K05adsp70-u:3083: api nu tasyā māyāyā vastv asti. yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyonir
K05adsp70-u:3084: vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyeṣu vā upapadyeta. yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu deveṣu upapadyeta?
K05adsp70-u:3086: na hi tasyā māyāyā vastv asty antaśo balāgrakoṭinikṣepamātram api. yatra sthitvā
K05adsp70-u:3087: karmābhisaṃskuryāt. yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyonir vā yamalokaṃ
K05adsp70-u:3088: vā devamanuṣyeṣu vā upapadyeta. yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu deveṣu upapadyeta.
K05adsp70-u:3090: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaścit tasyā māyāyā mārgabhāvanā asti. yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta?
K05adsp70-u:3091: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann avastukasya [f. 305a] dharmasya mārgabhāvanā kuto bhaviṣyati. saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā?
K05adsp70-u:3093: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ punas tathāgato nirmitaṃ nirmiṇoti kaccit tasya nirmitasya
K05adsp70-u:3094: vastv asti. yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyonir vā yamalokaṃ vā
K05adsp70-u:3095: devamanuṣyeṣu vā upapadyeta. yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyateneṣu deveṣu upapadyeta?
K05adsp70-u:3096: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann avastukaḥ sa bhagavaṃ nirmitaḥ.
K05adsp70-u:3098: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte. kaccit tasya nirmitasya mārgabhāvanā asti. yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vavadāyeta?
K05adsp70-u:3101: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaścid atra saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā?
K05adsp70-u:3104: yathaiva subhūte kaścin na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate tathaiva nāsti saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp70-u:3107: na ca bhūtadarśī saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā. yathaiva bhūtadarśī na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate tathaiva nāsti saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ. ((80))
K05adsp70-u:3111: bhūtadarśī bhagavaṃ na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate. 'bhūtadarśy api na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate. tathā hy abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
K05adsp70-u:3112: abhāvasya ca bhagavaṃ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ. bhāvasya api bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam,
K05adsp70-u:3113: svabhāvasya api bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ. abhāvasvabhāvasya api bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ. tad yad etad bhagavatā vyavadānaṃ
K05adsp70-u:3116: yā eṣāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatā tan mayoktaṃ vyavadānaṃ?
K05adsp70-u:3117: āha: sā punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatā katamā?
K05adsp70-u:3119: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā. dharmaniyāmatā
K05adsp70-u:3120: bhūtakoṭiḥ yo 'sāv utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthita eva dharmasthititādhātur
K05adsp70-u:3122: tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa vyavahṛyate. anabhilāpyaṃ punas tad apravyāhāraṃ. sarvagīrghoṣavākpathātītaṃ.
K05adsp70-u:3123: (VIII 5,25) āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamā. pratibhāsopamāḥ marīcyupamāḥ māyopamā nirmitopamās,
K05adsp70-u:3124: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnopameṣu sarvadharmeṣu pratiśrutkopameṣu pratibhāsopameṣu
K05adsp70-u:3125: marīcyupameṣu māyopameṣu sarvadharmeṣv avastukeṣv adravyeṣv anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K05adsp70-u:3126: cittam utpādayaty ahaṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi. śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi.
K05adsp70-u:3128: paripūrayiṣyāmi. abhijñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi. catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni.
K05adsp70-u:3129: catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattīś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni. yāvad āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ trīṇi
K05adsp70-u:3130: vimokṣamukhāni aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvasamāpattīn daśatathāgatabalāni. catvāri
K05adsp70-u:3131: vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇām dhāraṇīmukhāni samādhimukhāni
K05adsp70-u:3132: yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā. dvātṛṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni. aśītim (AdSPG II 127)
K05adsp70-u:3133: anuvyañjanāni mahābhāsaṃ pariniṣpādayati yat trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātūn avabhāsena spharati,
K05adsp70-u:3134: brahmasvaratāṃ pariniṣpādayati. yad eka svareṇa [f. 305b] daśadiglokadhātuṣu yathādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ajñāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi iti.
K05adsp70-u:3136: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte na tv ete dharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamā. marīcyupamāḥ māyopamā nirmitopamāhye tvayā parikīrtitā?
K05adsp70-u:3137: āha: yady ete bhagavan dharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamā. marīcyupamā māyopamā nirmitopamā,
K05adsp70-u:3138: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K05adsp70-u:3139: na hi bhagavan svapno bhūto na yāvan nirmitaḥ. na hi bhagavann abhūtena śakyaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:3140: caratā śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:3141: yāvad astādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caratā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ.
K05adsp70-u:3143: evam etat subhūte evam etat. na hy abhūtena śakyaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā. śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:3144: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. yāvad aṣṭādaśasv
K05adsp70-u:3145: āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caratā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ. sarva ete
K05adsp70-u:3146: dharmā abhisaṃskṛtā abhisaṃcetayitā. na hi śakyam abhisaṇiṣkṛtair abhisaṃcetayitair
K05adsp70-u:3148: anuprāptuṃ. api tu khalu subhūte sarva ete dharmā mārgāharaṇatāya saṃvartante mārgotpādāya na puna phalasya adhigamāya,
K05adsp70-u:3149: ya eṣāṃ dharmāṇām anutpāda aprādurbhāva alakṣaṇo 'pi saḥ. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva
K05adsp70-u:3150: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvat tam eva kuśalan dharmam ārabhate. yadi vā dānapāramitāṃ
K05adsp70-u:3151: yadi vā śīlapāramitāṃ yadi vā kṣāntipāramitāṃ. yadi vā vīryapāramitāṃ yadi vā dhyānapāramitāṃ
K05adsp70-u:3152: yadi vā prajñāpāramitāṃ yadi vā dhyānāni yadi vā apramāṇāni yadi vā ārūpyasamāpattīr
K05adsp70-u:3153: yadi vā smṛtyupasthānāni yāvan mārgaṃ. yadi vā ādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ.
K05adsp70-u:3154: yadi vā vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattī yadi vā yāvad āveṇikabuddhadharmān. tat sarvaṃ
K05adsp70-u:3155: māyāgatam iti jānāti. na śakyam imān dharmān aparipūrya dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ
K05adsp70-u:3156: kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikān
K05adsp70-u:3157: buddhadharmān aparipūrya sattvān paripācayituṃ. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:3158: caran yaṃ yam eva kuśalan dharmam ārabhate sarvaṃ taṃ svapnopamaṃ jānāti. yāvan nirmitopamaṃ
K05adsp70-u:3159: jānāti. sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ svapnopamāṃ jānāti. yāvan
K05adsp70-u:3160: nirmitopamāṃ jānāti. te sarvasattvā svapne caranti iti jānāti. yāvan nirmite caranti
K05adsp70-u:3161: iti jānāti. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran. svapnopamān dharmān
K05adsp70-u:3162: abhāvato gṛhṇāti. yāvan gṛhītvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. yāvan nirmitopamān dharmān
K05adsp70-u:3163: abhāvato gṛhṇāti. yāvan gṛhītvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. agrāhyā ca prajñāpāramitā.
K05adsp70-u:3164: agrāhyā yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva agrāhyāḥ sarvadharmā
K05adsp70-u:3165: iti viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp70-u:3166: tathā hy agrāhyāḥ sarvadharmā avastukāḥ svapnopamāḥ yāvan nirmitopamā,
K05adsp70-u:3167: na ca agrāhyeṇa. [f. 306a] dharmeṇa agrāhyo dharmaḥ śakyam anuprāptuṃ,
K05adsp70-u:3168: anyatra sattvā imān dharmān na jānanti na paśyanti. (AdSPG II 129)
K05adsp70-u:3169: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvasattvānām arthāya anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhate,
K05adsp70-u:3170: sa ca prathamacittotpādam upādāya yad dānaṃ dadāti. tat sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte. yac
K05adsp70-u:3171: chīlaṃ rakṣati yāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati yan vīryam ārabhate yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
K05adsp70-u:3172: yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati tat sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte,
K05adsp70-u:3174: na ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyasya kṛte 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhate 'nyatra sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte,
K05adsp70-u:3175: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ye asattve sattvasaṃjñayā sthitās anātmāny ātmasaṃjñayā
K05adsp70-u:3177: yāvad ajānake jānakasaṃjñayā sthitā apaśyake paśyakasaṃjñayā sthitās tāṃ viparyāsān
K05adsp70-u:3178: vivecayati. viparyāsād vivecya. amṛte dhātau pratiṣṭḥāpayati. yatra pratiṣṭhāpitānāṃ
K05adsp70-u:3179: neme samudācārāḥ pravartante. ātmasaṃjñā yāvat kārakakārāpakasaṃjñā vā,
K05adsp70-u:3180: sa sarvāṇi imāni nimiñjitamanyitaspanditaprapañcitāni tyaktvā amanyamānena cetasā
K05adsp70-u:3181: bahulam upasaṃpadya viharati. anena subhūte upāyena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05adsp70-u:3182: carann ātmanā ca na kvacid dharme 'bhiniviśate. sarvasattvāṃś ca anabhiniveśe pratiṣṭhāpayati.
K05adsp70-u:3185: kiṃ punaḥ sa lokavyavahāreṇa abhisaṃbuddhaḥ utaḥ paramārthena?
K05adsp70-u:3187: lokavyavahāreṇa vyavahṛyate. ayaṃ tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti. na punar atra kaścil labhyate. ayan dharmo 'nena dharmeṇa abhisaṃbuddha iti. tat kasya hetor?
K05adsp70-u:3188: upalaṃbho hy eṣa yaduta anena dharmeṇa ayan dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti. na ca dvayena kācit prāptir na abhisamaya.
K05adsp70-u:3189: āha: yadi bhagavan na dvayena prāptir abhisamayaś ca,
K05adsp70-u:3190: kiṃ punar advayena prāptir abhisamayaś ca?
K05adsp70-u:3192: na dvayena prāptir na abhisamayo na advayena prāptir abhisamayaś ca,
K05adsp70-u:3193: yathaivātra prāptir abhisamayaś ca. yatra na dvayaṃ na advayaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K05adsp70-u:3194: prapañca eṣa yadaiṣa prāptir eso 'bhisamaya. na ca dharmasamatāyāṃ prapañco 'sti. niṣprapañca hi dharmatā.
K05adsp70-u:3196: āha: abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ kā dharmasamatā?
K05adsp70-u:3198: eṣaivātra dharmasamatā yatra na bhāvo na abhāvo na svabhāvo na parikīrtanā,
K05adsp70-u:3200: na ca anyaḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate dharmasamatāyāṃ. sthāpayitvā sarvadharmavyativṛttā dharmasamatā,
K05adsp70-u:3201: agatir aviṣayo dharmasamatā. kasyacid bālasya vā āryasya vā.
K05adsp70-u:3202: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ dharmasamatā. tathāgatasya apy aviṣayaḥ?
K05adsp70-u:3204: aviṣayaḥ subhūte. dharmasamatā. sarvāryāṇāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ vā sakṛdāgāmināṃ vā anāgāmināṃ vā. arhatāṃ vā. pratyekabuddhānāṃ vā bodhisattvānāṃ [f. 306b] vā tathāgatasya apy aviṣaya.
K05adsp70-u:3205: āha: na punar bhagavaṃ sarvadharmaviṣayavaśavarttī tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ?
K05adsp70-u:3208: yady anyā dharmasamatā syād anyas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho,
K05adsp70-u:3209: yā ca subhūte pṛthagjanānāṃ dharmasamatā yā ca srotaāpannānāṃ yā ca sakṛdāgāmināṃ
K05adsp70-u:3210: yā ca anāgāmināṃ yā ca arhatāṃ yā ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ yā ca bodhisattvānāṃ yā ca
K05adsp70-u:3213: yā ca pṛthagjanānāṃ samatā yā ca sarvāryāṇāṃ samatā ekasamatā sā,
K05adsp70-u:3214: naikasamatāyāṃ dvayam asty ayaṃ pṛthagjano 'yaṃ yāvat tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti. sarva ete dharmā. samatāyāṃ nopalabhyante.
K05adsp70-u:3215: āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ sarva ete dharmā nopalabhyante. ayaṃ pṛthagjano
K05adsp70-u:3216: 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddhaḥ ayaṃ
K05adsp70-u:3217: bodhisattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. evaṃ saty aviśeṣo bhaviṣyati.
K05adsp70-u:3218: pṛthagjanānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ ca sakṛdāgāmināṃ ca anāgāmināṃ ca arhatāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ
K05adsp70-u:3219: ca bodhisattvānāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ ca arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ.
K05adsp70-u:3221: evam eta subhūte evam etad. aviśeṣaḥ sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ (AdSPG II 131)
K05adsp70-u:3222: pṛthagjanānāṃ yāvat tathāgatānāṃ ca arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ.
K05adsp70-u:3223: āha: yadi bhagavann aviśeṣaḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ yāvat tathāgatānāṃ ca arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ,
K05adsp70-u:3224: tat kuta eṣāṃ bhagavaṃs trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. buddharatmasya dharmaratnasya saṃgharatnasya?
K05adsp70-u:3226: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyad buddharatnam anyad dharmaratnam anyat saṃgharatnam anyā dharmasamatā?
K05adsp70-u:3227: āha: yathā ahaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasya artham ājānāmi na anyad buddharatnam anyad dharmaratnam
K05adsp70-u:3228: anyat saṃgharatnam anyā dharmasamatā. yad eva bhagavaṃ buddharatnaṃ yad eva dharmaratnaṃ
